type: Tutorial Step - What About Free Riders?

definition.text: Free riders are a problem, but we choose to assume goodwill! The ball is on your side of the court!

paragraphs.text: The project will soon implement an incentives scheme to further promote the desired behavior and to foster the culture of collaboration.
This means that our first choice to deal with free-riding is the positive route. However, we do not overrule the possibility of establishing negative incentives in the future.
Are you ready to hit that ball? Let's get on with it!
